title: OceanBase Cloud Overview
description: OceanBase Database is an enterprise-level, native distributed database. This dashboard showcases important insights and metrics enabling you to monitor your clusters on OceanBase Cloud

definition.content:
**About OceanBase**

OceanBase Database is an enterprise-level, native distributed database. This dashboard provides a high-level overview of  OceanBase clusters to track host, sql and transaction performance.

**Further reading:** 

- [Monitor data of OceanBase Cloud with Datadog](https://en.oceanbase.com/docs/cloud-oceanbase-cloud-10000000001576416)
A high-level overview of OceanBase clusters.
These metrics help analyze SQL performance.
Display metrics related to database transactions.
Display performance metrics of nodes, facilitating analysis of performance bottlenecks.
